programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '90s - Bob Saget (5/5/89)
programme.desc: Full House dad Bob Saget explains his attempts at trying to improve his appearance.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Ricardo Montalban (8/1/73)
programme.desc: Ricardo Montalban reveals his obsession with bullfighting.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Cybill Shepherd (6/8/89)
programme.desc: SNL alum Martin Short admits he was a singer before taking up comedy. Shows a clip from his HBO special.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - David Brenner (2/20/91)
programme.desc: David Brenner, Roger Rees and child actor Miko Hughes join Johnny and Ed for another episode full of laughs.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Carl Reiner (8/5/85)
programme.desc: Carl Reiner ate his way through France, complains to Johnny about weight gain. A clip from Summer Rentals.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Isabella Roselini (2/1/89)
programme.desc: Isabella Rossellini talks about being raised in France and Italy, plus Martin Short is ready to cook a goose.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Super Dave Osborne (2/10/89)
programme.desc: Stand-up master Super Dave Osborne sends up President George Bush, VP Dan Quayle and….reggae music!

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Richard Lewis (3/27/81)
programme.desc: Years before he was cast in Curb Your Enthusiasm, comic Richard Lewis did breakthrough stand-up.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Talk Show Greats - David Letterman (11/24/78)
programme.desc: David Letterman recalls his first appearance on The Tonight Show and his penchant for power tools.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '90s - Woody Harrelson (7/19/89)
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson talks about his latest film project, but he might be upstaged by animal wrangler Sunni Black.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Charles Grodin (12/9/83)
programme.desc: Frequent guest Charles Grodin discusses his movie The Lonely Guy, which also stars Steve Martin.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '90s - Craig T. Nelson (4/2/92)
programme.desc: Actor Craig T. Nelson recalls his first (disastrous) appearance on The Tonight Show.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Carl Reiner (1/4/83)
programme.desc: Carl improvises Italian aria and riffs on tabloid celebrity stories. Greg Louganis shows off on a trampoline.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Peter Fonda (1/4/85)
programme.desc: Actor/screenwriter Peter Fonda opens up about being compared to his father and sister.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Charlton Heston (4/30/80)
programme.desc: Two-time Oscar winner Charlton Heston describes his world travels and his two Oscars.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '70s - Steve Martin (12/14/88)
programme.desc: Comedian Steve Martin creates mayhem punching Santa backstage then sitting on his lap on Johnny’s couch.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '90s - Kevin Pollak (10/31/90)
programme.desc: Find out why is Kevin Pollak dressed as Cupid when he joins the show?
